diagrams.description: A comprehensive flowchart illustrating the pharmacy prescription filling process, including prescription validation, data entry with patient profile review, Drug Utilization Review (DUR), insurance adjudication with problem resolution, medication preparation, pharmacist verification, patient counseling, and final dispensing with multiple safety checkpoints.
